HANCOCK ST&MARCY AVE

Charming 1 bedroom apartment in stunning land marked /tree lined block

entry.title: $2650 // LUXURY STUDIO * WALL OF LARGE WINDOWS * SUNSET VIEWS - 2 WKS FREE RENT
entry.content:
ZURIEL HASKINS
Mobile: (917) 543-3226 | Email: zhaskins@areanyc.com

ATLANTIC AVENUE --- (FULTON STREET AND ASHLAND PLACE)
DESCRIPTION:
This 40th floor oversized studio residence is stunning, more like a mini loft. The floor to ceiling windows, which wrap around the space allow for beautiful natural light and views to the horizon. The kitchen features absolute black-honed, granite counter tops, full size stainless steel appliances, track directional lighting and Kohler fixtures. A washer and dryer is available in unit for maximum convenience. The bathroom features slate back splash, Kohler fixtures, and white quartz counters. Let me help you find your new home!!!

LAYOUT: Alcove Studio
GROSS MONTHLY RENT: $2,765

INCENTIVE: No Broker Fee + 1/2 Month Free Rent (12 Month Lease)

I specialize in: EVERYTHING RELATED TO BROOKLYN REAL ESTATE


We at Area New York work hard to find you the perfect property. Whether you are looking for a no fee apartment in Midtown West or a loft in SoHo, we have access to thousands of listings and can help. We have agents who specialize in: Brooklyn (Park Slope, Williamsburg, Bushwick, Fort Greene, Cobble Hill, Brooklyn Heights, Downtown Brooklyn and more!), Queens (Astoria, Long Island City, Rego Park, Forest Hills, Flushing, Ridgewood and more!), Staten Island and The Bronx (Riverdale, Pelham, Marble Hill and more!).. In Manhattan our Agents specialize in Battery Park, the Financial District, Tribeca, SoHo, Nolita, the Lower East Side, the East Village, the West Village, Greenwich Village, Chelsea, Union Square, the Flatiron District, Gramercy Park, Murray Hill, Midtown East, Midtown West, the Upper East Side, the Upper West Side, Harlem, Washington Heights and Inwood. We have agents who specialize in Pet Friendly Buildings, Roommates, International Clients, Penthouses and more! So if you're looking for pet friendly sublet or a large prewar apartment on Park Avenue, contact Area New York today! Our agents are trained to make great Craigslist ads that are legitimately available and accurate. Thinking about purchasing an apartment or investment property?
